宎字的基本解释

宎
yǎo
屋子里的东南角：“未尝好田而鹑生于宎。”
风吹入孔穴中发出的声音。

宎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǎo］
［《集韻》伊鳥切，上筱，影。］
风吹入深谷发出的声音。
[②]［yào］［yǎo］
同“1”。
房屋的东南角。

宎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　宎； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页282第19
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?伊鳥切，音杳。室東南隅也。亦作㝔。【莊子·徐無鬼】鶉生於宎。　又竅聲。【莊子·齊物論】宎者咬者。　又伊堯切，音幺。義同。

宎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
宎字的起名意思

暂无。

Sibling
Basic explanation of words
Sibling
yǎo
The southeast corner of the house: "It's not a good field, but the quail was born as a close friend."
The sound of wind blowing into the hole.
Sibling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǎo］
["Ji Yun" Yi Niao cut, Shang Xiao, shadow. ]
The sound of wind blowing into the deep valley.
[②]［yào］［yǎo］
Same as "1".
The southeast corner of the house.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【The first part of Yinji】【The Department of Lu Zi】　宎; Kangxi Strokes: 7; Page Number: Page 282 Page 19
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Yi Niao cut, the sound is 杳. The southeast corner of the room. Also made 㝔. [Zhuangzi·Xu Wugui] Quail was born in sibling.　 Another sound. [Zhuangzi·Qiwu Lun] The servant bites the one.　Yiyaoqi again, sound Yao. The same meaning.
